    Author:
    Tim Harrington

      • getMaxDepth

        public int getMaxDepth()
        Returns:
        the depth of the deepest node in the tree

      • getDepth

        public int getDepth(int i)
        Returns the depth of a node in a breadth-first labeled binary tree rooted at 1. The depth of node 1 is 0.
        Parameters:
        i - node label
        Returns:
        the depth of node i in the tree

      • getCommonAncestor

        public int getCommonAncestor(int i,
                    int j)
        Parameters:
        i - node label
        j - node label
        Returns:
        the label of the first common ancestor in the tree

      • commonAncestorDepth

        public int commonAncestorDepth(int i,
                      int j)
        Parameters:
        i - node label
        j - node label
        Returns:
        tree depth of the first common ancestor of i and j
